title: Analysis of Psychomotor Learning Effects Under Cannabis Influence: State-Dependent Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental pharmacological knowledge and understanding of psychomotor learning theory
context.additional_context: Learners analyze performance changes under medication influence and derive actionable insights for practical application through project deliverables, with hands-on practice using personal devices in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners quantitatively compare differences in psychomotor performance between drug-influenced and non-influenced states
Learners evaluate learning effectiveness under drug influence by applying state-dependent learning design principles
Through project-based assessment, optimal learning strategies are proposed under various medication conditions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
